content: Specify your company information, add links to external resources and email addresses displayed within the {{productName}} interface.

comment.text: Specify your company information and add links to external resources and email addresses displayed within the {{productName}} interface. This text is used in a mobile view of portal settings, guiding users on how to populate their branding section information.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Specify your company information' is not accurately translated. 'Göstərin' (show) doesn't convey the meaning of specifying or defining.
The word 'keçidlər' (links) is grammatically correct but 'əlavə edin' (add) doesn't fully capture the intended meaning. It implies adding something new, when it's more about setting or configuring.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: xarici resurslara və e-poçt ünvanlarına uyğunlaşdırın/təyin edin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation includes 'στο περιβάλλον εργασίας του {{productName}}'. While technically correct, it's a bit verbose. A more natural phrasing would be 'στο {{productName}}'.
The phrase 'Specify your company information' is not accurately translated. 'Tarkenna' implies refinement or clarification, which isn't the primary action of providing company information.
The translation of 'displayed within the {{productName}} interface' is slightly awkward. It's a bit too literal.
The phrase "メールアドレスの追加を指定してください" is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be something like "メールアドレスを追加してください" or "メールアドレスの追加場所を指定してください". While technically correct, it feels forced.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: メールアドレスを追加してください

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Specify your company information' could be translated more accurately. 'ລະບຸຂໍ້ມູນບໍລິສັດຂອງທ່ານ' literally translates to 'Specify your company data'.  A more natural translation might be 'ກະລຸນາລະບຸຂໍ້ມູນຂອງບໍລິສັດຂອງທ່ານ' (Please specify your company information).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກະລຸນາລະບຸຂໍ້ມູນຂອງບໍລິສັດຂອງທ່ານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation retains the English formatting of the placeholder {{productName}}.  While not technically incorrect, it's more idiomatic in Lao to potentially rephrase the sentence slightly to avoid directly including the placeholder. This is a minor point, but improves readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອີເມວທີ່ຈະສະແດງຢູ່ໃນສ່ວນຕິດຕໍ່ຂອງ {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'වි-තැපැල්' is a slightly awkward transliteration of 'email'. While understandable, a more common and natural phrasing would improve readability.
The sentence structure is a bit convoluted. While grammatically correct, it could be more fluid. The phrase 'ඇති වීමට' (to appear) after 'interface' feels clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ සමාගමේ තොරතුරු සඳහන් කරන්න, බාහිර සම්පත් සඳහා සබැඳි සහ විද්යුත් තැපැල් ලිපින {{productName}} අතුරුමුහුණතේ එක් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Specify' is not ideal. 'Specificiraj' is technically correct, but 'Določite' or 'Vnesite' would sound more natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Določite podatke o svojem podjetju, dodaj povezave do zunanjih virov in e-mail naslove, prikazane v vmesniku {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prikazane' (displayed) feels a bit clunky. A simpler and more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Določite podatke o svojem podjetju, dodaj povezave do zunanjih virov in e-mail naslove v vmesniku {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'емаил' is a transliteration of 'email' and should be 'е-маил'.
The phrase 'Наведите информације о вашој компанији' is a bit formal.  A more natural phrasing would be 'Унесите информације о вашој компанији' or 'Подесите информације о вашој компанији'.
The translation uses "okviru" which, while grammatically correct, sounds a bit formal for a user interface description. A more conversational alternative would improve user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Navedite informacije o vašoj kompaniji, dodajte linkove ka spoljnim resursima i email adrese prikazane u {{productName}} interfejsu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Ukrainian translation includes 'адреси електронної пошти' which is slightly redundant. 'електронні пошти' is sufficient.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Укажіть інформацію про свою компанію, додайте посилання на зовнішні ресурси та електронні пошти, що будуть показані в інтерфейсі {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Specify your company information" is better translated as "填写您的公司信息" or "设置您的公司信息" rather than just "指定您的公司信息". '指定' can imply a restriction or designation, which isn't the intended meaning here. '填写' or '设置' are more appropriate for configuring information.
